core_currency_name.label: Currency Name
core_currency_name.tooltip: This is your currency name, set it to the same currency name like you have in Streamlab chat bot

throw_command.label: Command
throw_command.tooltip: The command that will be responded to.

throw_permission.label: Permission
throw_permission.tooltip: Who is able to use the command

throw_info.label: Info
throw_info.tooltip: This field should only be filled when using the user_specific permission.

throw_cooldown.label: Cooldown (seconds)
throw_cooldown.tooltip: How long the command should go on cooldown for

throw_response.label: Throw response
throw_response.tooltip: The command that will be responded to.
